sentence: Did trump make the right choice when choosing his vp? it de-pence on who you ask.
explanation: In this context, de-pence refers to depending on someone for a choice. I feel like my overall happiness can de-pence on my ability to manage stress. My decision to go on vacation might de-pence on my financial situation.

sentence: This row represents the joke that meets your criteria about a word with dual meanings, spelled the same way in both meanings, exists in the dictionary, and is a single word.
